Row.oValue: LastName + (case when LastName<>'' and FirstName<>'' then ', ' else '' end) + FirstName

Row.MapTable: (select personfiltercategory, min(personfiltersort) personfiltersort from [Profile.Data].[Person.Filter] group by personfiltercategory) t

[Profile.Data].[Publication.Pubmed.Journal] x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#InformationResource' TypeValue union all select 'http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/Collection' union all select 'http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/Periodical' union all select 'http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/Journal') t
[Profile.Data].[Funding.Agreement] x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#Grant' TypeValue union all select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#Agreement') t

[Profile.Data].[vwPublication.Entity.InformationResource] x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#InformationResource' TypeValue union all select 'http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/AcademicArticle' union all select 'http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/Article' union all select 'http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/Document') t
[Profile.Data].[vwGroup.Member] x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#MemberRole' TypeValue union all select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#Role') t
[Profile.Data].[Funding.Role] x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#ResearcherRole' TypeValue union all select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#Role') t
[profile.cache].[Concept.Mesh.Count] c inner join [profile.data].[concept.mesh.descriptor] d on c.meshheader = d.descriptorname

[Profile.Cache].[Concept.Mesh.Person] u inner join [profile.data].[concept.mesh.descriptor] d on u.meshheader = d.descriptorname
[Profile.Data].[vwGroup.General] x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Group' TypeValue union all select 'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent') t
[Profile.Data].[Organization.Department] x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization' TypeValue union all select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#Department') t
[Profile.Data].[Organization.Division] x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization' TypeValue union all select 'http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#Division') t
[Profile.Data].Person x CROSS APPLY (select 'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person' TypeValue union all select 'http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent') t

Row.oValue: LastName + (case when LastName<>'' and FirstName<>'' then ', ' else '' end) + FirstName

Row.MapTable: (select p.PersonID, o.ORCID from [ORCID.].[Person] o join [profile.data].[Person] p on o.internalusername = p.InternalUsername) t

(select PersonID, [Utility.Application].[fnEncryptBase64RC4](p.EmailAddr,o.Value) Email from [Profile.Data].[Person] p, [Framework.].Parameter o where IsNull(p.EmailAddr,'') <> '' and o.ParameterID = 'RC4EncryptionKey') t
